title: You Forgot to Take Me With You
description: Quinn Levinson is alone. Aside from her two sisters, she has no one. Her mother left a week ago and her father's been dead for years. She'd been lucky enough to be cared for by her grandparents, but then they left to go on vacation. After receiving an unexpected phone call, Quinn and her two sisters embark on a journey across country in search of answers for all of their newly-found questions.
author: Gwendolyn Cook
